name: Spider City (LML STUDIO)
description:
You're driving home after a picnic in the woods, and after a while, you realize you've gone the wrong way and got lost in the forest. Suddenly, a place that looks like a city appears in front of you and you drive there. 

Unfortunately, the car runs out of gas and stops. You decide to find a motel in the city and stay overnight, but beyond your imagination, you quickly realize that the city has been abandoned. Giant spiders crawled all over the place and you were seen by them. They move towards you and now you become their delicious food. 

Luckily, there are some guns in the car, kill the spider and escape the city.

Kill them or they will kill you!

Control

WASD or Arrow keys to move.

Space to jump.

Left mouse button to shoot.

Scroll wheel to change weapons.

People who are afraid of spiders or have spider phobia should not play this game. Play at your own risk.
